How many people are affected by Pallister-Hall syndrome ?,This condition is very rare; its prevalence is unknown.,GHR,Pallister-Hall syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to Pallister-Hall syndrome ?,"Mutations in the GLI3 gene cause Pallister-Hall syndrome.  The GLI3 gene provides instructions for making a protein that controls gene expression, which is a process that regulates whether genes are turned on or off in particular cells.
